instructions.text: Move strip back and forward during 30 seconds in water. Afterwards, dry off excess water. (e.g. place it on a towel)
Dip strip into water for 1 second.
<!>Do not shake excess water from the test strip.<!
Fill sample vial HALF FULL with sample water.
Open one foil packet and add powder contents to vial.
Cap vial and shake rapidly for 5 seconds. Remove cap.
Dip a test strip into sample vial and rapidly move back and forth underwater for 15 seconds. Remove and shake excess water from test strip.
Dip a strip into water and remove immediately. Do not shake excess water from strip
Dip a strip into water for 5 seconds and remove. Do not shake excess water from strip
Collect 50 ml water sample using the provided bottle. <!>This sample size is for the range 0 - 500 ppb<!
Follow the instructions that came with the testing kit for adding reagens
Wait 20 minutes. Swirl twice during the reaction period
Collect 9.6 ml water sample using the small square container. <!>This sample size is for the range 0 - 4000 ppb<!
Follow the instructions that came with the testing kit for adding reagens
Wait 20 minutes. Swirl twice during the reaction period
Dip a strip in the water for at least 2 seconds and remove.
Shake excess water from the strip
